code: import firebase from"firebase";var firebaseConfig={apiKey:process.env.REACT_APP_FIREBASE_API_KEY,authDomain:process.env.REACT_APP_FIREBASE_AUTH_DOMAIN,projectId:process.env.REACT_APP_FIREBASE_PROJECT_ID,storageBucket:process.env.REACT_APP_FIREBASE_STORAGE_BUCKET,messagingSenderId:process.env.REACT_APP_FIREBASE_MESSAGING_SENDER_ID,appId:process.env.REACT_APP_FIREBASE_APP_ID,measurementId:process.env.REACT_APP_FIREBASE_MEASUREMENT_ID};var initFirebase=firebase.initializeApp(firebaseConfig);var db=initFirebase.firestore();export default db;
